QuestData.Title: Ice Cave Ya Got There
QuestData.Description:
Well, yer accent is atrocious, and ten-thousand years o' isolation an' linguistic drift hasn't done us any favors, but I think I got a rough impression at least.
The common thread in what they were tryin' to say was somethin' aboot a "bad cave wind" or an "evil storm cave." That, or their laundry was too Thursday?
Look, this isn't like learnin' Gnomish; there're goin' to be some hiccups. I'm pretty sure aboot the cave though, so let's start there.
QuestData.RewardText: I told ye I had the cave part right. Now we can see about establishin' some proper diplomatic relations.

Objectives.Objective: Investigate the cave in Winterpelt Hollow
